mapper.select: select count(*) from orders where to_char(ordcreatedat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(*) from orders where ordstatus='입금대기' and mid=#{mid}
select count(*) from orders where ordstatus='결제완료' and mid=#{mid}
select count(*) from orders where ordstatus='상품준비중' and mid=#{mid}
select count(*) from orders where ordstatus='배송중' and mid=#{mid}
select count(*) from orders where ordstatus='배송완료' and mid=#{mid}

select rownum as seq, ord.ordid, mid, prd.prdname, prdbrand, ordtotalamount, ordtotalprice, ordrequest, ordstatus, ordpostnum, ordcreatedat, ordreceivername, ordreceiveraddress, ordreceiverzipcode, ordreceiverphone, odt.prdcode, odtamount, odt.prdprice
from orders ord, ordersdetail odt, product prd
where ord.ordid=#{ordid} and ord.ordid = odt.ordid and odt.prdcode = prd.prdcode
